name: Correlate-sleep
tagline: This is an app that correlates every event in your life with your sleep performance, so you can analyze and find root causes of why your sleep performance is like it is.
body:
### Welcome to Correlate Sleep, a member of the Correlate Family.

This Correlate module helps you understand your sleep patterns, beyond what the usual app of the tracker can provide. As you start linking new services, you'll start discovering behaviors and patterns that will give you clues on how to improve (or, at least, understand) your sleep time.

### More here in the future

Right now we are developing everything. You can write us to start using our service, for FREE!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
